name: Spaceship Shooter (Ryan Beattie)
description:
Spaceship Shooter is a Endless Arcade Shooter where u must avoid enemies, hazards, and bullets while trying to get as many points as you can from shooting and destroying enemies & hazards.

Game Features
  • Endless waves of enemies, hazards & pickups.
  • 3 different types of pickups.
  • 5 different enemy ships.
  • 6 different asteroid hazards.
  • Game time depends on how long u will can last.

Spaceship Shooter is currently in development. Anything is subject to change during development. Any assets that are being used are listed in the credits menu in the game.
